items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript UI library built for the Salinity Engine editor.
items.title: salinityengine/suey: Lightweight JavaScript UI library built for the Salinity Engine editor.

items.content_html: EasyCalc-TS is a lightweight, user-friendly calculator built using TypeScript. This project aims to provide a simple yet powerful calculator application that can perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, making it easy for users to perform calculations on the go.
items.title: waniamaham/Easy_Calculator: EasyCalc-TS is a lightweight, user-friendly calculator built using TypeScript. This project aims to provide a simple yet powerful calculator application that can perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, making it easy for users to perform calculations on the go.

items.content_html: Lightweight clone of bit.ly written on Express Node.js, in Typescript, deployment-ready to Azure Web Service. Express routing is auto-generated when changes are made to a config mapping file of short-link to target full URL.
items.title: jimmy-zhening-luo/short-link-express: Lightweight clone of bit.ly written on Express Node.js, in Typescript, deployment-ready to Azure Web Service. Express routing is auto-generated when changes are made to a config mapping file of short-link to target full URL.

items.content_html: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With Xprz , you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.
items.title: m-mdy-m/Xprz: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With Xprz , you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.

items.content_html: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With XprsJS, you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.
items.title: Xprzjs/Xprz: Xprz is a lightweight and concise wrapper for Express.js, designed to simplify the process of building web applications with a minimalistic syntax. With XprsJS, you can define routes, handle middleware, and set up an Express.js server with ease.

items.title: honojs/hono: Fast, Lightweight, Web-standards

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: Demo application written in ThreeJS on Vite (lightweight JS platform for basic apps like this). Works best on desktop/laptop, but I did do some formatting for mobile landscape view to work as well.

items.content_html: Blockkube-explorer: A real-time Ethereum blockchain explorer built with Next.js & MongoDB. Features include dynamic data fetching, wallet insights, and optional full blockchain indexing. Ideal for intuitive Ethereum network interactions.
items.title: marcus-gomes-v/BlockKube-X: Blockkube-explorer: A real-time Ethereum blockchain explorer built with Next.js & MongoDB. Features include dynamic data fetching, wallet insights, and optional full blockchain indexing. Ideal for intuitive Ethereum network interactions.
